Articles.Content:
I am making a VTOL SSTO vessel in Blender/Unity. I have issues with stable flight with hovering engines. These engines are liquid rocket motors. What I am requesting is a plugin that will allow assigning the engines for balanced hover but at same time not restrict the RCS from turning left or right during level hover. I have used ThrottleControlledAvionics and DavonTCsystemsMod. Now ThrottleControlledAvionics does a great job at balancing the vessel however level RCS turning results in a roll and subsequent crash. Here is a crude layout of what I mean. Basically a assignable Orbiter style control system for ALL propulsion systems
